name: El Panadero
description:
El panadero. Bakery Based Brawling.

Arcade Style Action Platformer. 

Defeat the Man-eating Space Invaders in hand to rolling pin close quarters combat! Stun them with your long range dough throwing skills! 

  • Two player couch co-op. (requires two controllers)
  • Hand-drawn style.
  • Rarely seen (in games) locales!
  • Simple controls.
  • Language support for English, Spanish and Japanese.

The game is still in development. Please try this demo version. 

Controls:

Xbox style controller Move   dpad/left joystick Jump   Y/A Attack   X/B Start   Start Keyboard (QWERTY) Move   WASD/[↑][←][↓][→] Jump   SPACE BAR Attack   I,Y START   ENTER

Hint: Some enemies will only get real damage when hit directly with melee or with fire. Try to stunt them first!
